meta.content: Coronavirus Information - North Andover Public Schools

link.title: Coronavirus Information - North Andover Public Schools

div.b:
Schools are closed for the remainder of the school year.
Town Buildings are CLOSED until May 4th. Town Election is postponed until June 2nd.

font.font: about the town's response or about the illness, in general, can be sent to

td.span:
covid19@northandoverma.gov.
Or call the Town's COVID-19 Hotline at 978-208-6070.
